What we do when we unit test is that we implement our code in pojos
configured with spring and run them outside of weblogic. We only deploy code
in weblogic to run our acceptance test suite. If this sounds interesting I
can explain more.

/J

On 11/29/06, deveshkhattar <deveshkhattar@...> wrote:
>
>   Hi
> I need some help. I need to deploy my weblogic server each time i test
> my junits.As a result, a lot of time gets wasted. I would appreciate
> some help.
>
> thanks
> Devesh Khattar
